section.title: Distribution for z/OS overview
section.para: This is a distribution for all LegStar z/OS modules in TSO XMIT format.
This distribution groups all z/OS modules both in executable and source format in a set of TSO XMIT files.
You can install the executables directly without any compilation.
If you decide to compile and/or link-edit all the LegStar z/OS programs, you will find here sample JCL and cataloged procedures to help you.
In addition, this distribution includes a JCL for CICS RDO definitions.
For instructions on how to install this distribution follow this link.
